definition: the act of distinguishing by comparing differences, to put in opposition to show or emphasize differences
details:
noun
- the act of distinguishing by comparing differences
- the range of optical density and tone on a photographic negative or print (or the extent to which adjacent areas on a television screen differ in brightness)
- the perceptual effect of the juxtaposition of very different colors
- a conceptual separation or distinction
= synonyms: line
- the opposition or dissimilarity of things that are compared
= example: the opposition or dissimilarity of things that are compared
= synonyms: direct contrast
verb
- to put in opposition to show or emphasize differences
= example: to put in opposition to show or emphasize differences
- to show differences when compared
= example: to show differences when compared
= synonyms: counterpoint
